metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15217 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
ImageMagick 7.0.7-2 has a memory leak in ReadSGIImage in coders/sgi.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15217` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

imagemagick - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu6.2
